info.description: Bolla wines reflect true Italian style, and express the terroir of the Veneto region. Made from hand-harvested grapes, and aged for two months in oak. Enjoy aromas and flavours of cherry, raspberry and toasted nuts, with hints of licorice and spice. Serve with pizza, pasta or roast chicken with pomegranate glaze.

A description of Valpolicella attributed to Ernest Hemingway calls it 'a light dry red wine, as friendly as the home of a favorite brother.' Friendly notes of cherry, cedar and violets pull you in; flavours of ripe cherry, raspberry and spice embrace you and end in a silky finish. Serve with risotto, lamb or venison.

Bolla wines reflect true Italian style, and express the terroir of the Veneto region. Made from hand-harvested grapes, and aged for two months in oak. Enjoy aromas and flavours of cherry, raspberry and toasted nuts, with hints of licorice and spice. Serve with pizza, pasta or roast chicken with pomegranate glaze.
